article_title: Tiger King: Rick Kirkham says Joe Exotic asked him to kill Carole Baskin in Netflix aftershow episode
article_description: I ll make you a rich man if you kill Carole
article_content: Rick Kirkham  one of the stars of Netflix documentary Tiger King  claimed that Joe Exotic jokingly asked him to kill Carole Baskin during an appearance on a brand new aftershow The streaming service has released The Tiger King and I  a new episode that sees   28133 chars
